mapper.select: SELECT a.host_name, a.host_img, a.host_id FROM host a JOIN cont b ON a.host_id = b.host_id WHERE b.cont_no = #{cont_no}

SELECT a.cont_no, a.one_date, a.one_maxqty, a.one_status, a.pro_no, CAST(a.one_price AS DECIMAL) AS one_price FROM (SELECT * FROM one UNION SELECT * FROM prod) a JOIN cont c ON a.cont_no = c.cont_no JOIN cate ct ON c.cate_no = ct.cate_no WHERE a.cont_no = #{cont_no}

SELECT u.user_img, r.user_id, r.review_cont, TRIM(SUBSTRING_INDEX(review_img, '|', 1)) as review_img FROM user u JOIN cont c ON u.user_id = c.host_id JOIN review r ON c.cont_no = r.cont_no WHERE r.cont_no = #{cont_no} and (r.review_img!="" or r.review_img!=null) AND review_status = 'Y'
SELECT count(*) as Reviewcnt FROM cont INNER JOIN review ON cont.cont_no = review.cont_no WHERE cont.cont_no = #{cont_no} AND review_status = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS zzim_cont_cnt FROM zzim JOIN cont ON zzim.cont_no = cont.cont_no WHERE cont.cont_no = #{cont_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cont_cnt FROM cont WHERE host_id = #{host_id} GROUP BY host_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS review_cnt FROM review JOIN cont ON review.cont_no = cont.cont_no WHERE host_id = #{host_id} GROUP BY host_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS zzim_cnt FROM zzim JOIN cont ON zzim.cont_no = cont.cont_no WHERE host_id = #{host_id} GROUP BY host_id
